column4: What is something really cool that Ubuntu can do? ( That you like the best )

You have a home folder.  That's where all your stuff goes.  You'll probably want to break it down further, with whatever directory structure you'd like.
So I can put something like "docs" in /home/docs? ( is a good idea )
well, your home folder is /home/username/  (or ~/ for short), but yes.  docs, or whatever.
~/docs/ or ~/work or whatever youd like.
https://help.ubuntu.com/community/RPM/AlienHowto
http://www.tldp.org/LDP/Linux-Filesystem-Hierarchy/html/index.html  also http://www.secguru.com/files/linux_file_structure.jpg
remove, and you probably want --purge too (removes config files as well) apt-get remove --purge moo
